name.japanese: ガレーラカンパニー本社

description: The headquarters of Galley-La Company, the premier shipbuilding company in Water 7. Contains Iceburg's office and living quarters on the upper floors.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Stake Out Galley-La
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats position themselves near Galley-La headquarters, anticipating Robin's attempt to assassinate Iceburg. The Galley-La foremen stand guard inside.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the major confrontation where CP9's true identity will be revealed.

keyEvents.title: Iceburg's Comments About Robin
keyEvents.description: Inside Galley-La headquarters, Iceburg refers to Robin as 'a devil' and mentions her status as Ohara's sole survivor.
keyEvents.significance: Foreshadows the revelations about Robin's tragic past.

statusHistory.reason: Building is operational and heavily guarded

description: A bar in Water 7 frequented by Franky and the Franky Family. Serves as an informal gathering place for the group.

keyEvents.title: Franky Plans to Capture Usopp
keyEvents.description: Franky bursts out of Blueno's Bar and announces his plan to capture Usopp and use him as bait to draw out Luffy.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the confrontation between Franky and Usopp that will complicate the crew's situation.
